title: NexusDependencies
description: Static dependency graph for the project, including cycle detection results

edges.description: All import/export edges discovered in the codebase

from.description: Source file path relative to project root

to.description: Target file path relative to project root

type.description: Edge classification: import (static import), re-export (export { x } from), dynamic (import())

cycles.description: Detected circular dependency chains, each as an ordered list of file paths forming the cycle

items.description: An ordered list of file paths that form a circular dependency

lastAnalyzed.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of the last dependency analysis run
